title: Return to the Lonely Road
description: Brittany Stork’s decades-long quest to find out more about her mother’s mysterious death leads to a dramatic courtroom decision. The man at the center of the case tells his story to Dennis Murphy. Originally aired on NBC on March 27, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
